storyInfo: Back in Londinium, the workers begin working with Reunion. Amnannam descends upon the pinnacle of the Shard. Lifebone takes flight, picking up Amiya and the others.

attributes.content: This is how you do it, right? Aim at the enemy, then—
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A

attributes.content: Bloody hell.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A

attributes.content: Relax, Tommy. It's not much different from the machines you worked day after day, in that both can make a mess out of you in an instant. Just remember to keep the safety engaged when you're not using it.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Ha, haha.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A

attributes.content: Where did that white-haired Feline get all this stuff with things the way they are now?
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A
Catherine
attributes.content: Look at the...

attributes.name: Catherine
attributes.content: *cough* *cough*!
Catherine?
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A

attributes.content: I'm fine. Chronic stuff.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Look at the dust on these weapons. They're brand-new, but they've been in storage for a while.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: This isn't standard-issue military stuff, more like custom weapons for special operations, and they weren't made by Londinium factories
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Looks like Millscar is more than just your average gangster.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Do you mean she's an informant for somebody big? So, she's willing to trade weapons with us because—
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A

attributes.content: Don't expect to play an important role in their games. These stuff were probably meant for something else, and she came to us only after that fell through.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Or maybe Millscar raided some duke's secret arsenal in Londinium and selflessly decided to share it with people in need. Who knows?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: What she's after doesn't matter to us. We're just taking things one step at a time.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: We've sent a few scouts out since the sky turned red. For some reason, all the Sarkaz soldiers seemed to have pulled out of Highbury.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A

attributes.content: That doesn't mean we're safe. Quite the contrary, it means the Sarkaz don't care about managing the city anymore. Factories, production lines... none of these matter to them anymore.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I had a look at Magna Borough yesterday. It's been turned into a huge Arts Circle...
attributes.name: Londinium Worker B

attributes.content: Hundreds if not thousands are trapped in their strange witchcraft, fueling the Sarkaz altars.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker B

attributes.content: At this rate, it won't be long before it's our turn.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker B

attributes.content: What are you planning? Should we get that thing we've been building out there, and—
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A

attributes.content: Don't be silly. Just because you got some decent gear doesn't mean you suddenly became a commando.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: We have a few decent weapons. They'll allow us to defend ourselves if the Sarkaz come for us, no more than that.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: We must—
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: 'Wait for an opportunity.'
When do you think that opportunity is going to come, though?
Wh-Who are you? How did you find this place?
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A

attributes.content: ...I've seen your clothes.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: You went to all that effort to sneak into Londinium at a time like this, even investigating our background... what do you need with a few old workers, now?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Reunion?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: The 13th ventilation tunnel is running. There are marks on the 54th ropeway.
I suggest you double-check. If we can find it, so can the Sarkaz.
Oh, my name's Nine, by the way. And yes, I'm with Reunion.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Thanks for the heads up.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Did you come all this way beneath Londinium just to tell us this?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: We want to know how long you plan to wait.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: We have folks who used to work in Sudean Borough. They say the workers of Londinium were always proud that they built this great city.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: But has it ever truly belonged to you, past or present?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Madam Catherine, your condition—
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: I've heard the stories. I'll give you credit where it's due, but spare me that crap about the non-Infected taking everything from you. I'm not interested.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: What are a few rocks here and there in today's Londinium? We have a lot more to worry about.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: True.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Infected or uninfected... none of that matters in Londinium now.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: So, are you planning to take back the city?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: From all who stood idly by while all this happened, from the people who allowed things to get to this point.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: What did you say?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Londinium is filled with Originium dust. Many will become sick and die because of it.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: The culprit will be made to pay, whoever they are, whether they have rocks growing out of them or not.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Reunion won't wait at the finish line. Not anymore.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: You're—
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A

attributes.content: Hey, Tommy! Remember me?
attributes.name: Reunion Member A

attributes.content: Mayore! I thought you got sick and—oh, so that's how you ended up with Reunion.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A

attributes.content: Well, I'm back. Here, Oripathy prevention pills. Take one per day. There's only so much it can do, though, so you'd better pray that your luck's good.
attributes.name: Reunion Member A

attributes.content: You guys...
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A

attributes.content: To tell you the truth... your look when you left the factory... I thought you would have loved nothing more than for all of us to become Infected like you.
attributes.name: Londinium Worker A

attributes.content: Maybe I really did.
attributes.name: Reunion Member A

attributes.content: But it wasn't you who lost me my job. Wasn't Catherine, either. I know you lot tried to put in a good word for me, but those were the rules.
attributes.name: Reunion Member A

attributes.content: Maybe not anymore, though.
attributes.name: Reunion Member A

attributes.content: There's a lot we can help with—using and maintaining equipment, operating in high-Originium environments, tactics, covert operations. Anything you need.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: We'll help you liberate this place, if you'll let us... from the people who saw all this as nothing more than the 'price of business'.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: We'll take the city back, with or without you, Nine of Reunion.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: We look forward to working with you.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Aefanyl...
attributes.name: A Distant Voice

attributes.content: ...Mother?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: My child...
attributes.name: Blurred Silhouette

attributes.content: Have you come to see me off?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: You're badly hurt, my child.
attributes.name: Laqeramaline

attributes.content: I lost.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I did all I could, but I still lost.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: But I have no regrets about the path I chose, nor doubts about the ideals I believed in.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: ...But I'm sorry I let you down.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Why say that?
attributes.name: Laqeramaline

attributes.content: You have defeated so many powerful foes. How long has it been since the Court of the Banshees had a warrior and sovereign so strong, so steadfast?
attributes.name: Laqeramaline

attributes.content: The Court is proud of you. So am I, even if you reject the traditions of the Royal Court.
attributes.name: Laqeramaline

attributes.content: Thank you...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I ask one last thing... please, sing an elegy for me...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Mother?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Not so fast, my lazy boy.
attributes.name: Laqeramaline

attributes.content: It's not bedtime yet.
attributes.name: Laqeramaline

attributes.content: But I'm—
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Rise and shine, Aefanyl.
attributes.name: Laqeramaline

attributes.content: Up yet, sleepy-head?
attributes.name: Banshee-Style Device

attributes.content: ...Mother?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Good, you still recognize my voice.
attributes.name: Kindly Voice

attributes.content: How about a kiss for your dear mother on the cheek? It's been so long, after all.
attributes.name: Kindly Voice

attributes.content: I... I don't think...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: This strange contraption... were you always by my side?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Me? Of course not. A mother should let her son roam free, once he's all grown up.
attributes.name: Kindly Voice

attributes.content: Just a little token of love to record important moments in your life for me.
attributes.name: Kindly Voice

attributes.content: I will say, I was a little surprised it recorded not just your performance in battle, but you putting this outfit on...
attributes.name: Kindly Voice

attributes.content: Hm... I know, Her Highness Theresa liked it this way, but...
attributes.name: Kindly Voice

attributes.content: Never mind. As long as you like it.
attributes.name: Kindly Voice

attributes.content: You're bothered by what I'm wearing? When this device of yours...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Isn't it adorable?
attributes.name: Kindly Voice

attributes.content: A Banshee should value her words, rather than waste them on disputing the aesthetics of a gadget.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: How could you say that!
attributes.name: Gentle but Stern Voice

attributes.content: Think of all the love that your mother and sisters put into it! Is this how you repay our affection?
attributes.name: Gentle but Stern Voice

attributes.content: Thank you, Mother.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Go. Your friends are waiting.
attributes.name: Kindly Voice

attributes.content: I'm so proud of you.
attributes.name: Kindly Voice

attributes.content: (Intimidating roar)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: It's a dead end! Sheer cliff ahead!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Wait, from the Shard...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What's that?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We're too late.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The last vestige of Teekaz fades away.
But it had gotten an answer, a recognition, a response.
The sensation was subtle at first.
But the clouds no longer converged upon the pinnacle of the Shard, replaced by something else.
The branches and vines began to bear red fruit.
It is a bizarre scene, but somehow it inspires comfort rather than fear, as though this is how it should be, how it always has been.
The world seems to have always been like this; all that has happened is that someone had removed the back cover of a clock by accident, revealing the springs and gears underneath.

Originium is an integral part of Terra's ecology. Originium in the atmosphere bring about Catastrophe, and Originium in the body cause sickness. Even insects know to cover themselves in hard shells of Originium.
The coexistence of Originium and Terra is an immutable law, just like how two parallel lines can never intersect.
But where did Originium come from?
The Confessarii's control over Amnannam exceeds our expectations. We're one step too late.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Will it become a weapon for the Sarkaz?;Can the Sighs of Kings still fight it?

attributes.content: No... Amnannam brings more than Catastrophe, and it's far more than a weapon.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's not just the origin of the Sarkaz... in fact, one could say it's the origin of everything in Terra.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This may be the greatest crisis we've ever seen... maybe the greatest crisis Terra has ever seen.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Can we stop it?;We need to find a way out of here first!

attributes.content: The Lifebone. W is there. We can seek the Feranmut's help!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Let me try to get in touch with W—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, I'm not getting through—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hello? Hello? ...Finally!
attributes.name: W's Voice

attributes.content: ...Bunny... where...
attributes.name: W's Voice

attributes.content: Almost... Manfred... Hoederer has...
attributes.name: W's Voice

attributes.content: The agreed time...
attributes.name: W's Voice

attributes.content: W! They're alive!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But the interference is too strong...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Where? How did—
attributes.name: W's Voice

attributes.options: Find where the biggest commotion is! That's where we are!

attributes.content: Lost contact.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What did you mean by 'commotion', Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Originium is everywhere here.;And what catches W's attention like nothing else?

attributes.content: Unreasonably risky.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But... worth a try.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Twelve hours ago...
Fifty-eight hours into the operation...
Sir, we've taken control of the Lifebone's central area.
attributes.name: Royal Court Soldier

attributes.content: Examine the skeleton and eliminate any resistance. Tell Nadine to clean up the remaining mercenaries outside. Leave no survivors.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Set up defenses around the skeleton and rig it with explosives.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Do you mean to...?
attributes.name: Royal Court Soldier

attributes.content: ...Yes, Sir!
attributes.name: Royal Court Soldier

attributes.content: The blood reaches Manfred's feet. He takes one glance at the body on the ground, then turns and leaves the room.
What to do with enemy mercenaries that we captured in the Lifebone, sir?
attributes.name: Royal Court Soldier A

attributes.content: Is this all of them?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yes, sir. Many of them previously served the Military Commission.
attributes.name: Royal Court Soldier A

attributes.content: Kill them all.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Royal Court Soldier A

attributes.content: Show yourself.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: G-General Manfred...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: ...Paprika.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Was I supposed to see you here?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I... I was captured by the mercenaries here while transporting a shipment.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I had to protect my squad...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: That doesn't explain why you didn't respond when the Military Commission attacked this skeleton.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: And what were you doing hiding here?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I... I was just afraid.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Hmph. Afraid.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Your previous mission is over, Paprika.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Your new mission is to execute these traitors to the Military Commission.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: But... but they're prisoners, defenseless—
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: As warriors, they're traitors to their cause. As mercenaries, they've unilaterally broken their contract. One way or the other, they must pay the price.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: B-But they're in no position to resist anymore. They're no threat to you.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: What meaning is there to all this killing? Didn't you say yourself that you wanted as many Sarkaz to go home as possible—
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I gave you a chance, Paprika. I've been very patient.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You're not the first one to disappoint me today.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: General!
attributes.name: Royal Court Soldier B

attributes.content: The engineers have examined the Lifebone. The structure is largely intact, and the mercenaries don't have the means to make direct modifications. However...
attributes.name: Royal Court Soldier B

attributes.content: We found a large amount of explosives that were not set by us.
attributes.name: Royal Court Soldier B

attributes.content: Explosives?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Unable to reach Lieutenant General Nadine, sir!
attributes.name: Royal Court Scout

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: That hard-headed Hoederer can come in useful once in a while. You really did lead an attack squad, Manfred.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Is this our first formal meeting? I guess I should introduce myself. I'm from Babel, and I'm here to take your life. You can call me W.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: A mercenary from Hoederer Squad...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You came back to die?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Die?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Pfft. Have you thought for a moment that why your attack has gone a little too smoothly? Where did you think all the mercenaries went?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Who's surrounded now?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You think this rabble can stand against the soldiers of the Military Commission?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I hope your bones are as hard as your words.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Because I'll blow your head off before your soldiers can even knock on the door.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Manfred begins to swing, but shadows entangle his feet. Then bombs explode all around him before he can break free.
Aim, W!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Stop complaining! I told you I'm good at controlling explosions!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: *cough*—
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You're trying to destroy the skeleton—
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Oh, is that not very convenient?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm not sentimental like Hoederer is. I have absolutely no problem making this big pile of bones your grave.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I wonder what Theresis would be sadder about: Losing this big guy, or losing his favorite foster son.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You think I'd let you do that?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: ...Not a moment too soon.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Ascalon?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You look...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The bloodied assassin stops the foe's sword, not the slightest hint of wavering in her sleeve-blade.
You...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You're not ready to kill me.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Cut off this guy's golden head, Ascalon, and I'll listen to anything you say for a whole year!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I've asked you this question before, Ascalon. What do you believe in?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: ...I believe that our differences end here and now.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: And this time, there will be no mistake.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Seventy hours into the operation...
*Huff*... *huff*... won't let me have a breather.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Crane! Where are you guys? You were supposed to be guarding the top of the spine. Why do troops keep dropping down—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Oh, Crane's dead. Damned Manfred. I think I have a concussion.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ascalon—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She's outside.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Looks like we're bringing a whole bunch of dead bodies with us. Great.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W! Am I seeing this right? Is this nerve bundle glowing?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Did the Doctor's team make it?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: W—
attributes.name: *Radio Noise*

attributes.content: Try—take off—
attributes.name: *Radio Noise*

attributes.content: —biggest commotion—
attributes.name: *Radio Noise*

attributes.content: They're trying to reach us!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Ines, is Hoederer still breathing?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Weak breathing)
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The bleeding's stopped, at least.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Then wake him up and get him to put his Feranmut friend to work!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're asking too much—
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Fine, maybe Hoederer needs to lie down a little longer. Well, this guy has been lying down long enough.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Bonesy! Wake up! How do you like this alarm clock?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W, you lunatic! Hoederer is wounded!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Explosions echo in the chamber, followed by a rumbling, muddled voice.
Mm?
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: Oh, it's you. The Sarkaz historian. What happened to your face? Did your great adventure not go well?
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: Oh, shut up! Get us out of here if you don't want your last bones blown to smithereens! And shake those Royal Court fleas off you if you can.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Oh, I forgot. My body's still here.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: The flea part is a little too much to ask. You all look the same size to me.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: Mm. I suppose we should go.
attributes.name: Muddled Voice

attributes.content: The voice sighs, stirring up a turbulence in the fabric of time and space.
...This round is mine.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I have no intention of gloating. It took too much time, and... you've never been so weak before.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The previous battle had taken its toll on you, and this type of operation is not your forte.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: We've both missed opportunities.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: A new Kazdel is complete. You know that, Ascalon. You know that you are fighting against our own future.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Future, you say.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: You say I never saw clearly what our sovereign was thinking.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: But I understand now.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Someone will complete the work that she left unfinished. Amiya, Kal'tsit... I will remove all obstacles that stand in their way.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: How blind and stubborn. Why do you not understand that this was Lady Theresa's wish too?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Enough.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: We're enemies, no more, no less. We've long passed the point of no return.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: The Lifebone is activating? How could—
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You've failed. You can't stop us anymore.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: This skeleton will be destroyed.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: No one can threaten the future that His Highness will bring to Kazdel.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Even if neither of us will live to see it.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Manfred throws down his sword and takes out the detonation switch. He places his finger on it.
Hesitation.
Why?
He has seen death in the eye many times. He does not fear it. Why should he hesitate?
But the Lifebone...
How many people could it guide home?
Ascalon throws herself at Manfred in his moment of hesitation.
The two of them fall into the turbulence together.

attributes.options: Right here, where the mountain's energies are most focused.

attributes.content: This will cause an extreme, uncontrolled Originium chain-reaction.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Get ready, Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ready—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Black Arts penetrate the mountainous Originium.
The collapse has begun.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Run!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You grab Mon3tr's claw, an action that has become second-nature. Mon3tr screeches joyfully and begins to run.
Behind you is the terrifying roar of destructive energy running rampant.
The violent chain-reaction causes everything around you to tremble.
The legions of Nachzehrers follow the trembling.
The Sudaram are chasing us!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't fight them! Don't let them bog you down!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Warriors wrapped in tattered banners swarm upon you. Many of them are swallowed by the Originium chain-reaction, but even more join the ranks of your pursuers.
(Unhappy Whining)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Sudaram entangle Mon3tr. You hear their hollow breathing echo in your ear.
The Nachzehrer warriors are trying to drag all of you into the pit of death.
'Shadows of conflict, yield to conflict.'
Trust your elite operators, Doctor.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: They'll show up when you need them the most.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.options: I've always trusted you.;I know I can count on you.

attributes.content: Don't let your guard down.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I sense turmoil in the fabric of reality. The Feranmut is coming.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I will attempt to create a waypoint to help us board the skeleton.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Jump down from the cliff.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.options: ...Alright.;I'm beginning to regret what I just said.

attributes.content: Time is of the essence.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Doctor, Amiya, Dr. Kal'tsit... now.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Jump.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Drive the Feranmut! I'll take care of the Royal Court soldiers!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: A-Am I driving?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ok, Bonesy, er, go to where the biggest commotion is.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: There is no response. The muddled voice says nothing. Perhaps it just cannot be bothered.
It's not gonna send it inside the barrel of some super-gun, is it?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The intangible tide fades.
It really sent us right into the middle of an explosion.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I think I'm beginning to enjoy this.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Threads of silver-white incantation snag the drifting Feranmut, and several figures fall into the room.
Bunny? Banshee?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You made it?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: We made it.;It takes an explosion to catch the attention of a bomb maniac.

attributes.content: Not bad. You actually made it out of the Confessarii's evil ritual alive.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Bonesy is fine, as you can see.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hoederer took a hit from Manfred's sword, but he's still breathing.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: As for the others...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We found no trace of Ascalon or Manfred on the skeleton.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: She got tangled with Manfred and didn't make it in time when the skeleton took off.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Ascalon's ability is beyond question.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: You can trust her as you trust me.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Crying won't change anything. We have stuff to do.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What's the next step?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We've already drawn too much attention. We need to drift, now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
